sources.title: A Date for Dinner (1947)
sources.description: Some mice decide to tease a cat, but he is hungry and determined and easily catches them. Just as he is about to eat them, Mighty Mouse comes to the rescue. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/a-date-for-dinner-1947/

metadata.Plot: Some mice decide to tease a cat, but he is hungry and determined and easily catches them. Just as he is about to eat them, Mighty Mouse comes to the rescue.
metadata.Writer: John Foster, Tom Morrison, Paul Terry
